author: Z.B. Steele
description:
It’s that time of the year for us to gather around a fire and talk about our favorite books of the year! Pour an egg-nog, grab the cookies, and get a towel as we go through the best fantasy, horror, and sci-fi books of 2025 as picked by the team here at Grimdark Magazine. Strength […]

The post The best fantasy, horror, and sci-fi books of 2025 appeared first on Grimdark Magazine.
title: The best fantasy, horror, and sci-fi books of 2025
